original_title: Manhattan protesters chant 'globalize intifada' amid bipartisan pushback | Fox News
article_summary: Thousands of pro-Palestine demonstrators rally in New York, calling for a "global intifada" and end to aid to Israel, sparking controversy and bipartisan calls for condemnation due to the phrase's historical association with violence against Jewish communities. A New York City mayoral candidate, Zohran Mamdani, has been criticized for not publicly denouncing the phrase.</s>
